attributes.action: Have Eric Bristow stripped of his MBE.
attributes.additional_details:
An sound article is located on the BBC website at the following link:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/darts/38141331
attributes.background: While his sporting achievements may have warranted a Royal honour, these comments are deplorable to the level that this recognition must now be withdrawn.  This will be a public and permanent condemnation of the man himself and a reminder that these comments are NOT acceptable in modern society.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here: https://www.gov.uk/honours
